description: This file defines the IZigWave interface for ZigBee/ZigWave device management within the WPEFramework. It includes method declarations for device permitting, retrieving device information, and binding/unbinding devices.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: Interface for managing ZigWave devices, including permitting devices, retrieving device info, and managing device bindings.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks if a device at a given address can be permitted; also sets the permit state.

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a device given its ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all available device IDs.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Creates a binding between source and destination devices.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes a binding between source and destination devices.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
